page.title: 02Playground Games
page.content: Sidies is a game where two teams stand on each side of the playground and throw a tennis ball to each other. If you catch the tennis ball without it bouncing you get a point, but if you catch it then drop it you do not get a point. Semies is another game where you have to throw a tennis ball to each other across a netball court, also in this game like Sidies you have two teams.The scoring in Semies is not like the scoring in Sidies because in Semies if it lands in the semi-circle you get a point and also if it is caught you get a point.
